title: Bloomberg Markets: Strava Connects Runners, Riders, Hikers

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: James Quarles Chief Executive Officer Strava Discussing his role as new CEO of the social network app for athletes with specific interests.
